title: Retry build and resolve deployment failure

requirements.text: Retry the application build and deployment, capture the full deployment error output, and fix the underlying issue so the canisters and frontend deploy successfully on the Internet Computer.
acceptanceCriteria: A new build + deploy attempt completes without errors.
If the deploy fails again, the full error output (including stack trace/log lines) is captured and surfaced in the deployment output for diagnosis.
After the fix, `dfx deploy` (or the platformâ€™s equivalent deployment command) succeeds for both backend and frontend artifacts.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Adding new product features unrelated to build/deploy stability.
Changing backend data models or adding migrations unless required to fix the deployment failure.
